caption.p: Minimum inhibitory concentration of mupirocin against S. aureus ATCC ® 29213™: A – Mueller-Hinton Agar (MHA) supplemented with 1% (v/v) Tween ® 80 without fennel essential oil (FEO) or trans-anethole ( tA), B – MHA supplemented with 1% (v/v) Tween ® 80 and 0.75% FEO, C – MHA supplemented with 1% (v/v) Tween ® 80 and 1.5% tA
